National Agency for the Great Green Wall (NAGGW) bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị Naijiria n'okpuru Federal Ministry of Environment (Nigeria), nke e guzobere iji dozie mmebi ala na ọzara, bulie nchekwa nri na nkwado obodo iji mee mgbanwe ihu igwe na steeti Naijiria nke Sokoto, Kebbi, Kastina, Zamfara, Kano, Jigawa, Bauchi, Gombe, Yobe, Borno, na Adamawa. NAGGW na-eje ozi dị ka ebe a na-elekwasị anya na Naijiria maka mmelite nke ọhụụ nke African Union Great Green Wall of the Sahara na Sahel project. Ebumnuche nke NAGGW bụ ịkwụsị ma gbanwee mmebi ala, gbochie mmebi nke ụdị dị iche iche, hụ na ka ọ na-erule afọ 2025, gburugburu ebe obibi na-eguzogide mgbanwe ihu igwe ma na-aga n'ihu na-enye ọrụ dị mkpa nke ga-enye aka na ọdịmma mmadụ na mkpochapụ ịda ogbenye.

E guzobere National Agency for the Great Green Wall (NAGGW) site na Iwu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu n'afọ 2015 iji mezuo ọhụ nke African Union na ndị isi ya na steeti nke gọọmentị Great Green Wall of the Sahara na ọrụ Sahel Initiative (GGWSSI) nke afọ 2007. Omume ahụ lekwasịrị anya na mgbalị iji lụso mmebi ala, ụkọ mmiri ozuzo na ọzara na egwu ndị ọzọ nke mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na mgbalị na usoro mmejuputa iji melite ihe ndị obodo ndị ahụ metụtara ma belata ngosipụta doro anya nke ịda ogbenye na iwulite ume nke ndị mmadụ na ihe omume nke mgbanwe ihu ọha
Ogologo usoro mmejuputa nke mmemme GGW na-ekpuchi steeti ndị dị n'ebe ugwu (Adamawa, Borno, Bauchi, Gombe, Jigawa, Kano, Katsina, Zamfara, Sokoto, Kebbi, na Yobe).

Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Onye isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria họpụtara, onye na-aza ajụjụ maka mmezu nke iwu, mmemme na atụmatụ dịka Council kwadoro; na nchịkwa kwa ụbọchị nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
DG nke ugbu a bụ Dr Yusuf Maina-Bukar onye Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara n'ọnwa Eprel 1, afọ 2022 maka afọ anọ mgbe oge Dr Bukar Hassan gwụsịrị.
